data.text: A batu bama, wanu malongi mama !
Ndiela zibula munu ama mu tuba zingana
momo tuwa ayi momo tuzaba
Tulendi masuekila ko bana bawu ;
Wuvana zithumunu mu diambu di Yakobi.
buna tsungi yinkuiza, yela zaba mawu
buna bela tula diana diawu mu Nzambi,
Balendi ba banga bakulu bawu ko ;
Batu ba Efalayimi bobo baba ayi mimbasa,
Basi keba ko Nguizani yi Nzambi,
Bazimbakana momo kavanga ;
Wuvanga bikumu va ntuala bakulu bawu
Wuvasa mbu ayi wuba viokila muawu ;
Wuba diatisa mu dituti va muini,
Wubasa matadi mu dikanga,
Wutotula mimvuila minlangu mu ditadi
Vayi babuela tatamana sumuka diaka va ntualꞌandi ;
Batota Nzambi mu luzolo lungolo,
Batubidila Nzambi batuba :
Bu kabula ditadi dingolo, mbadi nlangu wutotuka
Yave bu kaba wa, wufuema ngolo,
Bila basia wilukila Nzambi ko,
Muaki wuvana lutumunu kuidi matuti ma yilu
Wunokisa mana mu diambu di batu muingi badia ;
Batu badia dipha di zimbasi ;
Wuvevumuna phemo yi Esite mu diyilu.
Wuba nokisila zimbizi banga mbungi-mbungi ;
Wuba buisila biawu va khatitsika ka kiawu ;
Badia nate bayukuta kuwombo ;
Tuamina batamba bidia biobi baleba mu kingolo mbusa,
Nganzi yi Nzambi yi babuila ;
Ka diambu ko mambu moso momo, batatamana vola masumu
Buna wumanisa bilumbu biawu mu phamba
Kadika khumbu kaba kuba vondanga, tombanga baba kuntombanga,
Batebuka moyo ti Nzambi niandi wuba dibanga diawu
Vayi buna bankamba mambu ma lueki mu miunu miawu
Mintima miawu misia ba mifuana kuidi niandi ko
Vayi niandi wuba nkua kiadi
Wutebuka moyo ti baba minsuni kaka ;
Zikhumbu ziwombo bantingunina mu dikanga,
Khumbu ka khumbu baba vutukilanga diaka tota Nzambi ;
Basia tebukila ko moyo lulendo luandi
mu lumbu kamonisa bidimbu bi bikumu biandi mu Ezipite,
wukitula minlangu miawu menga ;
Wufidisa nkangu zinzinzi ziozi zibadia
Wavana mimbutu miawu mu zitsola kuidi binzienzi
Wumana bunga zindima ziawu zi vinu
wuyekula bibulu biawu kuidi mvula yi matadi
Wuba fidisila nganzi andi yi mbazu, miangu miandi mi ngolo
Wukubika nsolo mu diambu di nganzi andi
Wuvonda bana boso batheti bababakala ba Ezipiti
Vayi wutotula batu bandi banga mamemi ;
Wuba diatisila mu luvovomo ;
Buna wuba kotisa mu yenda tsi andi yinlongo ;
Wukuka makanda ku ntualꞌawu ;
Vayi batota Nzambi ayi batinguna Nzambi Yizangama ;
Banga madisa mawu
Bamfuemisa mu bibuangu biawu bizangama
Nzambi bu kawa, buna wufuema ngolo
Wuyekula, nzo ngoto mbuabununu yi Silo ;
Wufidisa kesi yi lulendo luandi mu buvika,
Wuyekula batu bandi mu sabala,
Mbazu yi zinisa bamatoko mawu,
Zinganga ziawu zinzambi zimana fuila mu sabala
Buna Yave wukotuka banga mutu wuba wuleka,
Wuvutula bambeni bandi ku manima ;
Buna wuloza zinzo zi ngoto zi Zozefi,
Vayi wusobula dikanda di Yuda,
Wutunga buangu kiandi kinlongo banga bibuangu bizangama,
Wusobula Davidi kisadi kiandi
Wumbongila vana vaba mamemi momo kaba sunga
Buna Davidi wuba nsungi awu
